pr_title: minor: fix sonar violation 'Refactor this repetition that can lead to a stack overflow for large inputs.'

timeline.bodyText:
Why do we have * on _? Do we have any token with 2 or more underscores?
Shouldn't this be ([A-Z]+_)+[A-Z]+ ?
If there is a case with no underscore, then it should be something like  ([A-Z]+_)+?[A-Z]+ .
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText:
to not fix too much problems in same time , I moved it to #9140
we need current fix to make CI green again asap.
replies.author: romani
